评论详情: I am a 36C petite - so I selected a small. The top looks nice/feminine and fits my body perfectly. The waffle material is a nice soft texture. I just love the shoulder caps - gives the top an expensive appearance.  Flattering and well made - I recommend!

评论概述: Soft but a tiny bit sheer
评论详情: I am obsessed with the vintage look of this incredibly soft top. The shell is an incredibly soft knit fabric that is the tiniest bit sheer due to the waffle knit style, and the cotton eyelet sleeves are almost a tulip or flutter sleeve but are all one piece. The cutouts give some fin flair an the top hits right at the hip bone so I can wear untucked if I choose. I will have to wear a camisole or slip underneath but this is not a big deal since I love the top so much. It's a loose fit and the pink is a beautiful ballet pink color. I am very happy with this and can't wait to wear it!

评论概述: A good choice for the upcoming heat in the summer- stays fresh looking
评论详情: This waffle knit top has short sleeves of eyelet in matching Rose Red and decorative trim around the crew neck.  I usually wear a 14-16 but I order my tops in XX size to allow for shrinkage in washing/drying and different sizing.  This fits loosely and feels very soft against the skin.  The waffle knit is stretchy- another plus.  The top isn't bulky and looks nice under a shirt  and the color is really lovely.  No smell to fabric when I unpacked it.

I was very pleasantly surprised when I received this - the material is soft and drapy without being flimsy. The workmanship appears to be really good, and it fits better than expected. The color is as it appeared on my monitor (which was also somewhat of a surprise) - I have not washed it yet, so the jury is out on how it will come out of the sash (will update this review if needed). I can see wearing this for business meetings, lunches out in town and many other occasions. I think it can be dressed up or down very easily. I would definitely order this again!

This is a really nice, elevated t shirt for summer, or for layering. The texture of the fabric itself, paired with the detailing on the neckline and the eyelet style sleeves really make it easy to pull together outfits that are just a bit dressier than a regular t shirt. The fit is true to size, and the fabric itself is very soft. It is easy care, machine washable, although due to the detailing around the neck I washed mine in a mesh laundry bag and dried on low still in the bag to keep it from getting caught on any buttons. It turned out perfectly, and seems like it will travel well. This is definitely a very versatile piece, and will definitely work with a lot of different styling options.

This top is so pretty and the perfect casual top with just enough 'Extra' to make it a little dressier.  It is very comfortable and runs true to size. The color is beautiful.  It washes very well.  I love the sleeves and how they accent the top.

I love this top. It's soft, true to size and color and very cute. I love layering with tops like this to keep me from getting too hot or too cold. I washed on cold and dried flat, and it's perfect so far.

The shirt is cute and comfortable. You can dress it up or down. It is true to size and the color is great. The fit and finish of this shirt is very good, it is short sleeved, and is nice enough to wear to office. Great for going out for the summer. I highly recommend it.
Very pretty top, loser fitting. The sleeves are really pretty and make this top. Note that it is a little seethrough so you will need to choose undergarments carefully

I ordered this shirt in Green, size Medium.  This is one of those shirts that looks even better in person than it did in the listing.  It is very well made, and the green color is beautiful.  The detail on the sleeves is SO pretty!  The shirt fits true to size.  I would definitely recommend this shirt!

This is a pretty blouse with a unique design on the sleeves. The material is a knit waffle design, that is definitely breathable. I love how the sleeves cover a good amount of my arms. The length is good and is true to size.

评论概述: Womens Frenchy Summer Tops Crewneck Short Sleeve T Shirts Casual Waffle Knit
评论详情: This is the perfect Lightweight, Spring/Summer/Fall knit top in an a soft creamish-pink color.  The top is very soft and quality material & pattern.  It has layered eyelet lace short sleeves that dress up the top.  It reminds me of something you’d find at a boutique. It is perfect for layering with your favorite blazer or cardigan. I recommend!

I saw this beautiful Frenchy, summery, short-sleeved, T-shirt and knew that this could look really special, or could be casual, or anywhere in between.  The fabric is a waffle knit jacquard that I chose in white so that it will be that much more special for me. The sleeves are gorgeous with their own personality as a cap sleeve. I also love the neckline since it has its own special look to it. The white shirt is really nice and special. The price is perfectly matched with the style of the shirt at $21.99.  I can also machine wash this shirt since it is made of mostly polyester, which is super soft against skin, and very easy to take care of. I am in awe of the soft waffle knit fabric. It can go with anything and any season. I personally can’t wait to wear this shirt with summer Linen shirts and flat sandals. Such a cute outfit.
